title: Sentencing for investment adviser in $1.2B Ponzi scheme
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Business - Today 
An investment adviser faces possible prison time for his role in the $1.2 billion Ponzi scheme operated by disbarred attorney Scott Rothstei...
